reviewText: What was not to like. This guy is a musical genius and is really creative. One of the most creative drummers I have ever seen. Marko talks several concepts and plays some tunes. He breaks down the concepts into a format for any level drummer to understand and learn. He makes everything look easy and effortless. A true master.

I bought this for my son who is currently studying drumming at Berklee College of Music.
He loved this video: "Seriously one of the best drum videos I have ever seen."
